author: elecharny
msg: Fix for the Ldif importer, so that \ does not escape any more hexa chars (like a-f).
The LdifFile name is translated to the heaxdecimal textual representation when loaded into the server.

author: vsiveton
msg: MJAVADOC-120: Better handling of Javadoc resources: overview.html, doc-files
o copy /src/main/javadoc/**/doc-files to the output directory
o autodetect the overview in the /src/main/javadoc directory

author: mikem
msg: Fixes upgrade bug in writeExternal of Heap, it was writing the wrong
conglomerate format id in the case of a hard upgrade accessing an
existing Heap from an old database.  It was writing out the hardcoded
id when it should have been writing out the dynamic one in the class's
